column5: I would like to thank all well wishers,and yes TJ you still stand a chance,but not for long....lol....Cisco,please pass the news along and yes your probably right ,BUT,I never beat up anybody that didn't deserve it.....lol....And thx again all......OH and from the 8th line park here in Innisfil.....nuthin' but ice,almost ,there's a strip of open water just this side of Fox and Snake Islands....and with this cold and no snow on top,she'll be makin' ice all day.........WWWWOOOOOHHHHOOOO......tight lines all...Chuck..

Awesome news Chuck....awesome!!!!! Take your time with the physio........and do it right..the whole program Ive rushed it before only to have the injury come back and bite me in the butt years later...so enjoy your time off and do some fishing whenever you can. That was a terrific offer you threw out on the board....wish I could take you up on it. pete
Good to hear Chuck, hopefully see you at the meet and greet for Tyler, won't be fishin but if I can walk I will be there!!  Rob C
Hey Chuck,  keep me a spot next to your whole would you? What do you think sometime during this week or next weekend? I am sure those whities are waiting for us  Cheers, Ice Fisherman

Hey Big Chev      This is Gooood.    I kinda figured you were getting better.  Re  your post from last week Boat fishing in the waves,  Emile   Hope to be Perch fishin' this week.  shoot me an e-mail.
Glad to hear you are getting rid of the brace bud I hope the fish cooperate on your new found freedom.  Art
Gee, had no idear. Good to hear y'all in good spirits. Elly Mae says she kinda likes ya.
.....I'd be up for a day on the ice with you and Shelley if I can swing it Chuck. I'm pleased to hear you are doing well.

Just to let everyone know that I'm BRACELESS now as the doc told me not to put it back on....So with the physio happening and strength training starting ,It won't be long,well, long enough.....Anyways I've still got a couple of months to wait to go back to work ,So,anybody want to FISH?????Simcoe will be happening soon and I'm offering FREE guided trips to those who want to go....just Pm me for details.....tight lines.....Chuck....
Hey Chuck, that is Awesome news!!!...now you can get your beard back   .  Can't think of a better post to wake up to   .  Good luck with the fishing, but save some for Feb. will ya  Maureen

Excellent news Chuck and great to hear your on the mend !!  Accidents happen so darned fast, yet the recovery often takes so long, but at least your heading in the right direction and that's the main thing.

WHEN THE ICE IS THICK ENOUGH BIGCHEV ME AND LITTLE C WOULD LOVE IT!!! AND IF YA GET A CHROME ITCH I'D BE MORE THEN HAPPY TO TAKE YA OUT!!! GOOD TO HEAR THE BACKS COMIN ALONG!!! SLOW PROCESS I KNOW BUT YOU'LL BE BACK TO NORM BEFORE YA KNOW IT!!
Good news Chuck !!!Glad to here your almost there..  Cheers !!

That's wonderful news! A lot more positive than the first posts we got after your accident! Don't know if I'll get a chance to get out fishing with you but looking forward to seeing you at the Tyler G2G.  Thanks for the update.
You'll heal faster than you think. Your making good progress already. wooo wee Free quided trips. Thats awesome!! I just might.  dsn
Good to hear that Chuck,must be a relief to get the brace off.Now thats all said and done,get the auger out and start shappenning the blades bud LOL. The ICE IS COMMING  Steve
Thats great news bud.Lookin forward to the reports. Joe
sounds GREAT Chuck!!!
Great news!  Glad to hear you are progressing along. Before you know it you will be back to work and will be wondering where the time went.
Glad to hear everything is going well. Take your time let it heal right and best of luck with the recovery. I hope you get lots of fishing in before returning to work.  Mike

That's the kind of news we like to hear Charles.  Seems like you healed up pretty quick, but I know there's still a lot of healing left.  I broke a vertibrae in my spine a few years ago and took at least 1 year to heal enough to say it was O.K, but it will never be 100% again.  Wish you all the best with the recovery bud.
Great news Big Congrats!

I'll PM you when the ice is thick enough.  It's funny, I fish a minimum of 100 days a year.  90% of those days, I'm bass fishing.  But, I still have never caught a whitefish!  I've gone out to Simcoe, dropped spreaders, Badd Boyz, Half and Halfs, all I ever catch are lakers !!

Great news Chuck, sounds like you're making good progress, but remember to take it easy as you (and probably everyone else here) don't want you to do anything that will set things backwards.  I'll get on that Free guided list! (if there's safe ice)  Take good care, Stan
Great to hear your making progress.  Should you decide to go just be careful out on the ice, the last thing you need to do now is fall!

Fantastic news Chuck, hope everything continues to improve for you. Wish I was living down there now, so you could guide me to those whitefish hotspots. We have a few areas up here that offer that resource, I just haven't taken advantage of the opportunities yet.  One of these days, will try for 'em. Lakers up here I know well.
Ya... but Chuck.. I can still take you.... lol

Good news Chuck, I'm recovering from a spinal injury too. I have been 1 1/2 years out of work and will be returning in a week or so. Take your time to heal even if you feel really good it could be a false sence of security and you can reinjure weak tissue quite easily so take your time. Fresh air, and fishin should really help. Physio and stretching will take time but will help. Good luck and I too would like to be added to the free guide list. I'll be in touch when its good.

Makes my day to hear the great progress report! Maybe during the next week or two we can get together. GT and Chuckles have been buggin me re your recovery status.  I'll lettem know and maybe we can all go drown some worms on Simcoe together!  Hey TJ, I bet Big Chev has pushed bigger guys than you out of the way TO GET INTO A GOOD FIGHT!
good to hear Chuck  I'm sure  I will see you out there fishing a few times this year
Great new Chuck.  Now remember, with the brace off now, don't tick Shelley off, she can choke you now  Now if you could just pray for some more ice, we'd all be set.  Cheers.  Joey
Great news Chuck, don`t rush it though.
